languages.text: {n}Едва сдерживая тремор, Висирь кланяется так низко, как ему позволяет согбенная спина.{/n} "Прости нас за грубость, тебя оскорбить не желали. Ты наш первый гость с палуб верхних за множество лет. Обычаи тех, кто давно служит смерти... немного отличны. Но будь уверен{mf||а} — в них непочтения нет".

{n}Struggling to suppress the tremors in his body, the Vizsier bows as low as his hunched back allows.{/n} "Forgive us our poor manners. Our intention was not to insult you. You are the first visitor from the upper decks we have had in a great many years, and the customs of longtime servants of death are... somewhat different. But rest assured that there is no disrespect in them."
languages.original_text: {n}Едва сдерживая тремор, Висирь кланяется так низко, как ему позволяет согбенная спина.{/n} "Прости нас за грубость, тебя оскорбить не желали. Ты наш первый гость с палуб верхних за множество лет. Обычаи тех, кто давно служит смерти... немного отличны. Но будь уверен{mf||а} — в них непочтения нет".

But rest assured that there is no irreverence in them."

languages.text: {n}Der Wesir müht sich, das Zittern in seinem Körper zu unterdrücken, und verneigt sich so tief, wie sein Buckel es ihm gestattet.{/n} "Vergebt uns unsere schlechten Manieren. Wir hatten nicht die Absicht, Euch zu beleidigen. Ihr seid seit vielen, vielen Jahren der erste Besucher von den Oberdecks, den wir empfangen, und die Bräuche der langjährigen Diener des Todes sind ... etwas anders. Doch seid versichert, dass sie keinen Mangel an Respekt bezeugen."
languages.original_text: {n}Struggling to suppress the tremors in his body, the Vizsier bows as low as his hunched back allows.{/n} "Forgive us our poor manners. Our intention was not to insult you. You are the first visitor from the upper decks we have had in a great many years, and the customs of longtime servants of death are... somewhat different. But rest assured that there is no disrespect in them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Wesir müht sich, das Zittern in seinem Körper zu unterdrücken, und verneigt sich so tief, wie sein Buckel es ihm gestattet.{/n} "Vergebt uns unsere schlechten Manieren. Wir hatten nicht die Absicht, Euch zu beleidigen. Ihr seid seit vielen, vielen Jahren der erste Besucher von den Oberdecks, den wir empfangen, und die Bräuche der langjährigen Diener des Todes sind ... etwas anders. Doch seid versichert, dass sie keinen Mangel an Respekt bezeugen."

languages.text: {n}Luchando por contener los temblores de su cuerpo, el Visir se inclina hasta donde le permite su espalda jorobada.{/n} «Disculpe nuestra carencia de modales. No era nuestra intención insultarl{mf|e|a}. Es nuestra primera visita de las cubiertas superiores en muchos años, y las costumbres de los sirvientes de la muerte más veteranos son... algo diferentes. Pero le aseguro que no tenemos la menor intención de ofenderl{mf|e|a}».
languages.original_text: {n}Struggling to suppress the tremors in his body, the Vizsier bows as low as his hunched back allows.{/n} "Forgive us our poor manners. Our intention was not to insult you. You are the first visitor from the upper decks we have had in a great many years, and the customs of longtime servants of death are... somewhat different. But rest assured that there is no disrespect in them."

No era nuestra intención insultarl{mf|e|a}. Es nuestra primera visita de las cubiertas superiores en muchos años, y las costumbres de los sirvientes de la muerte más veteranos son... algo diferentes. Pero le aseguro que no tenemos la menor intención de ofenderl{mf|e|a}».

languages.text: {n}体の震えを抑えるのに苦心しているヴィジールは、その歪んだ背中が許す限り低く頭を下げる。{/n}「我らの酷いマナーをお許しくだされ。侮辱するつもりはなかったのだ。上層デッキからの客人は久しぶりなうえ、長年死に仕える者たちの習慣というものは…少しばかり異なるのだ。だが、不敬はないことだけはお約束しよう」
languages.original_text: {n}Struggling to suppress the tremors in his body, the Vizsier bows as low as his hunched back allows.{/n} "Forgive us our poor manners. Our intention was not to insult you. You are the first visitor from the upper decks we have had in a great many years, and the customs of longtime servants of death are... somewhat different. But rest assured that there is no disrespect in them."

traits.locale_text: {n}体の震えを抑えるのに苦心しているヴィジールは、その歪んだ背中が許す限り低く頭を下げる。{/n}「我らの酷いマナーをお許しくだされ。侮辱するつもりはなかったのだ。上層デッキからの客人は久しぶりなうえ、長年死に仕える者たちの習慣というものは…少しばかり異なるのだ。だが、不敬はないことだけはお約束しよう」

languages.text: {n}宿老尽可能弯下了腰，努力抑制着身体不住的颤抖。{/n}“请原谅我们的失礼，我们无意冒犯您。这么多年来，您是第一位来自上层甲板的贵客。我们这种人长期侍奉死亡，我们的习俗可能会……不太一样，但请您放心，我们没有一丝不敬之意。”
languages.original_text: {n}Struggling to suppress the tremors in his body, the Vizsier bows as low as his hunched back allows.{/n} "Forgive us our poor manners. Our intention was not to insult you. You are the first visitor from the upper decks we have had in a great many years, and the customs of longtime servants of death are... somewhat different. But rest assured that there is no disrespect in them."

traits.locale_text: {n}宿老尽可能弯下了腰，努力抑制着身体不住的颤抖。{/n}“请原谅我们的失礼，我们无意冒犯您。这么多年来，您是第一位来自上层甲板的贵客。我们这种人长期侍奉死亡，我们的习俗可能会……不太一样，但请您放心，我们没有一丝不敬之意。”

languages.text: {n}Luttant pour réprimer les tremblements qui agitent son corps, le vizir s'incline aussi bas que son dos voûté le lui permet.{/n} « Veuillez excuser notre outrecuidance. Notre intention n'était pas de vous insulter. Cela faisait très longtemps que nous n'avions pas reçu la visite d'{mf|un représentant|une représentante} des ponts supérieurs, et si les coutumes de ceux qui servent la mort depuis toujours sont quelque peu... différentes, soyez {mf|assuré|assurée} que nous ne cherchions pas à vous manquer de respect. »
languages.original_text: {n}Struggling to suppress the tremors in his body, the Vizsier bows as low as his hunched back allows.{/n} "Forgive us our poor manners. Our intention was not to insult you. You are the first visitor from the upper decks we have had in a great many years, and the customs of longtime servants of death are... somewhat different. But rest assured that there is no disrespect in them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Luttant pour réprimer les tremblements qui agitent son corps, le vizir s'incline aussi bas que son dos voûté le lui permet.{/n} « Veuillez excuser notre outrecuidance. Notre intention n'était pas de vous insulter. Cela faisait très longtemps que nous n'avions pas reçu la visite d'{mf|un représentant|une représentante} des ponts supérieurs, et si les coutumes de ceux qui servent la mort depuis toujours sont quelque peu... différentes, soyez {mf|assuré|assurée} que nous ne cherchions pas à vous manquer de respect. »

languages.text: {n}Bedenindeki titremeleri bastırmakta zorlanan Vezir, kambur sırtı müsaade ettiğince eğiliyor.{/n} "Görgü kurallarına aşina olmadığımız için kusurumuza bakmayın. Niyetimiz sizi aşağılamak değildi. Geçen bunca yıl içinde üst güvertelerden ziyaretimize gelen ilk kişi sizsiniz. Uzun zamandır ölümün hizmetkârı olanların gelenekleri ise... Biraz farklıdır. Ancak sizi temin ederim ki içlerinde hürmetsizlik bulunmaz."
languages.original_text: {n}Struggling to suppress the tremors in his body, the Vizsier bows as low as his hunched back allows.{/n} "Forgive us our poor manners. Our intention was not to insult you. You are the first visitor from the upper decks we have had in a great many years, and the customs of longtime servants of death are... somewhat different. But rest assured that there is no disrespect in them."
